Log-Normal distribution¶

Summary¶

class TheoryLogNormal.BaseTheoryLogNormal[source]¶

Log-Normal distribution

  • Function
    \[W(M) = W_0 \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{\pi}} \frac{1}{M} \exp\left[ - \frac{\left(\ln{M}-\ln{M_0}\right)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right]\]
  • Parameters
    • logW0 \(\equiv\log_{10}(W_0)\): Normalization constant.
    • logW0 \(\equiv\log_{10}(M_0)\)
    • sigma \(\equiv\sigma\)
